entry.title: Tuesday: A few flurries. Temperature steady near minus 4.
entry.summary: A few flurries ending late this morning then cloudy. Local amount 2 cm. Wind northwest 20 km/h becoming light this morning. Temperature steady near minus 4. Wind chill near minus 10. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 07:00 AM EST Tuesday 24 January 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Cloudy. Low minus 14.
